alert.note: Alert for Prentiss; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Union, northwestern Lee, southeastern Tippah and southwestern Prentiss Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blair, or 7 miles southwest of Baldwyn, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Baldwyn, Saltillo, Guntown, Blair, Wheeler, Dumas, Blue Springs, Graham, Jericho, Branyan, Ellistown, Alpine, Blackland, Birmingham, Jug Fork, Corrona, Graves, Geeville and Locum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
